channel.title: Pot
channel.description: I dont see why people think its so bad. It is alot better than drinking, you know what your doing. I dont know thats just my opinion. Whats yours?

item.title: Pot
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I’ll agree with Chris. At first, I found anything related to alcohol to taste horrible, I still find most of it to taste just down right bad. But, I enjoy some of it, although I can’t find myself addicted to it. I drink with friends, I don’t get drunk. It’s for fun, not a life commitment.

Read full topic

item.title: Pot
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yz - I have to disagree with your opinion on drink. 90% of the time I drink Cider. Getting drunk with cider is pretty easy, and aslong as you don’t drink bottles and bottles and bottles of it, all you feel is a little groggy in the morning. I’m sure it’s very hard for teenagers to get addicted to alcohol. In 2 years time, you’ll be drinking <3

item.title: Pot
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:48, topic:187017”]I think it depends on your reason for doing it alone. I’ve talked about this with my mum several times, because she thinks that my use of mind altering shit alone is a sign of addiction, because “shit you can’t even be bothered to wait for some friends before you break out da drugz”.

It’s not really that at all though. Half of it is boredom :P, but also, drugs are so much different on your own. Even alcohol, I find, is a lot more introspective alone, and a completely different feeling altogether.

Then again, maybe I’m just odd. :D[/quote]

Yeah… I smoke a lot of pot alone. It relaxes me, makes me feel good, etc. Same reason many people would drink tea.

The odd time, I just want to trip out on hard drugs alone. When your with your friends, you are way too busy laughing at stuff or whatever. When you are alone, it’s like major mind exploring.

Doing drugs or alcohol alone just seems to break the social norms of society. There’s no real reason for it though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @step_one step one
item.description:
@step_one wrote:

Drugs make me feel better, it shouldnt be called a drug, maybe an eye opener.

Read full topic

item.title: Pot
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I think it depends on your reason for doing it alone. I’ve talked about this with my mum several times, because she thinks that my use of mind altering shit alone is a sign of addiction, because “shit you can’t even be bothered to wait for some friends before you break out da drugz”.

It’s not really that at all though. Half of it is boredom :P, but also, drugs are so much different on your own. Even alcohol, I find, is a lot more introspective alone, and a completely different feeling altogether.

Then again, maybe I’m just odd.

Read full topic

item.title: Pot
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’ve never done any of the sort, smoke, drink etc. I do not plan to, as I believe all it is a waste of time, personally.
I mean, I have better things in life at the moment to look forward to, e.g racing, the next day. I don’t have anything against people who smoke pot or drink etc, as long as that and I are separate, and not drawn together.

Mainly I don’t because of:
Drink - A lot of the time you wake up the next morning regretting it, and is addictive, causing a lot of people to ruin their lives.
Smoke - Ruins your physical health. I take pride on being as healthy as I am, not to mention my goal in life is to become the best at racing a dirtbike, and I am not going to rest until I achieve that. So, I try to stay as healthy as I can possibly be.
Do drugs - Heh, lots of reasons.

Read full topic
